profileAlternative.name: Pamela Shea Gaughan
profileAlternative.headline: LINES// 9to5 Seating, Green Furniture Concept, Rouillard, Arnold Contract and Haskell

positions.title: LINES// - Contract Furniture Group in New England
positions.companyName: Manufacturer's Representative Group for Contract Furniture and products
positions.description:
LINES// is a New England Area Contract Rep Group for:
9 to 5 Seating, a line specializing in the design and production of ergonomic office seating with collections of executive, task, side, conference, and stool seating.
Frasch, manufacturing acoustical solutions that enhance the visual style of any space while also reducing unwanted noise
Green Furniture Concept exceptional public space seating solutions with environmental sustainability. Their eye-catching seamless wood seating designs and configurations are endless for large spaces such as universities, shopping centers, libraries, lobbies, hotels, and more. They also offer the Leaf Lamp series an ambient and acoustic lighting solution made entirely of natural materials.
Rouillard builds contract furniture with a formal yet relaxed feeling to it, they offer executive and simple design solutions for soft seating and lounge to integrate into any environment.
Arnold Contract offers a wide range of high quality office and institutional furniture. Providing corporate and government customers with products that include conference tables, reception desks, library furniture and courtroom furniture.
For the newest in education, Haskell Education a manufacturer of active classroom learning products such as the Explorer maker-space series.


…
see more

positions.title: Manufacturing Representative
positions.description: Was the Arnold Group's factory representative covering dealer relations, including sales presentations and training in the Arnold's custom capabilities of wood office furniture. Training and updates included all office furniture dealers and designers in the Rhode Island, Massachusetts, Maine, New Hampshire and Vermont territory .
